Texto: 
right-sided hemiparesis and aphasia
supportive
• hyperdense middle cerebral artery (mca) on left
• extensive low attenuation region in the left mca territory
• eyes deviated to side of brain lesion
cerebral infarction, hyperdense mca sign
• cerebral infarction
• tumor
• abscess
• trauma
61 year old man with a sudden onset of right-sided hemiparesis and aphasia.
